org.apache.fontbox.cff

Class CFFFontROS

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.fontbox.cff.CFFFont
      • org.apache.fontbox.cff.CFFFontROS

  • public class CFFFontROS
extends CFFFont
    This class represents a CID-Keyed CFF/Type2 Font.
